commandDescription: Retrieve IDs of successful deployments with tests within a given time range
beforeFlagDescription: date time before which the deployments should be retrieved
afterFlagDescription: date time after which the deployments should be retrieved
outputFlagDescription: where do you want to output the results
targetFlagDescription: target location to save the results (do not include the file name)
latestFlagDescription: retrieve only the latest deployments (provide the "max" flag to retrieve more than one)
maxFlagDescription: maximum number of deployments to be retrieved
errorNoOrgResults: No results found for the org '%s'.
